title: Do you want to sub to me!

replies.body: Don't demand me to sub to you. One thing I dislike within several communities is that people say "Sub to me!"; if I like your content, I will subscribe. Saying that essentially makes me NOT want to subscribe, and with all the disclaimers in so many channels begging for subs is bad. Please don't become one of them.

Saying that essentially makes me NOT want to subscribe, and with all the disclaimers in so many channels begging for subs is bad. Please don't become one of them.
